channel.title: Kind of newbie question but
channel.description:
Hey, I'm pretty much brand new to this whole Private Server thing. It seems pretty forward except I have a couple of questions that I'm sure some of you can answer :D
I have acquired an edited source(based off of PimpScape) that has a few extra things such as portals leading to different areas, quick monster spawns, edited item drops, etc.
Now I was wondering how exactly do [i]I[/i] go into my server and see if everything is working that I also added onto the source along with the edits already made?
When I click the runserver.bat it opens up a console that says: Starting EyreScapePK Server on 0.0.0.0:5555 How would I go about connecting to my source basically or how would I connect my source to a pre-made client.

item.title: Kind of newbie question but
item.dc:creator: @Sin2 Sin_
item.description:
@Sin2 wrote:

Download MoparScape client. Then type in your username and password for the server. Keep the ip: localhost, 127.0.0.1, or 0.0.0.0 and that will work. Change the port to 5555.

Read full topic
